channel.title: FaceAPI on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in FaceAPI on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Let's recognize emotions with Azure Face
item.description: I've used it recently, so I'll write a little. Since this is my first post, there may be many mistakes and missing parts. I would appreciate it if you could kindly teach me :girl_tone1: Azure Face had a strong impression of face authentication, I thought it was interesting because I could recognize emotions, so I tried using it for emotion recognition. #Azure Face *I used the python SDK. What you can do: face verification, face detection, emotion recognition It seems that there are other ways to find similar faces, group with the same face, etc.
